meanings.definition: A person who scolds or rebukes others.
meanings.sent1: The scolders in the neighborhood always remind us to keep the noise down.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the scolders to stop interrupting the class.
meanings.sent3: The scolders at the park were like a flock of bossy birds.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were scolders, silently reprimanding him for his mistake.
meanings.sent5: The scolders in the office made sure everyone followed the rules.
